typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PlaceUUID as long,
		ProvinceLegacyID as integer,
		PlaceLegacyID as integer,
		PlaceNameEnglish as string,
		PlaceNameFrench as string,
		RegionUUID as integer,
		PlaceAlternateIndicator as string,
		LastModifiedDate as date,
		PlaceMailingIndicator as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['output/int19/dbo.INT_Place.parquet']) ~> FilePlace
source(output(
		StreetLegacyID as integer,
		PlaceUUID as integer,
		StreetAlternateIndicator as string,
		StreetDirectionTypePrefixAbbreviationEnglish as string,
		StreetDirectionTypePrefixAbbreviationFrench as string,
		StreetNameArticleEnglish as string,
		StreetNameArticleFrench as string,
		StreetNameEnglish as string,
		StreetNameFrench as string,
		StreetDirectionTypeAbbreviationEnglish as string,
		StreetDirectionTypeAbbreviationFrench as string,
		StreetTypeSuffixAbbreviationEnglish as string,
		StreetTypeSuffixAbbreviationFrench as string,
		StreetTypePrefixAbbreviationEnglish as string,
		StreetTypePrefixAbbreviationFrench as string,
		LastModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['output/int19/dbo.INT_Street.parquet']) ~> FileStreet
FilePlace, FileStreet join(FilePlace@PlaceUUID == FileStreet@PlaceUUID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IJoinStreet
